&reftitle.install;
You have to compile PHP with the option --with-oci8[=DIR], where DIR defaults to your environment variable ORACLE_HOME.
If you're using Oracle Instant Client, you need to build PHP with the option --with-oci8=instantclient,/path/to/oic/lib. Note that Oracle Instant Client support first appeared in versions 4.3.11 and 5.0.4.
Note that in OCI8 versions before 1.1 you have to use --with-oci8-instant-client to configure PHP with Oracle Instant Client.
